original_content:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical implementation, responsible for aligning complex enterprise systems with evolving organizational needs. As a technical configuration specialist, you will play a pivotal part in ensuring our core systems accurately reflect and support our business processes. By combining your business acumen and technical proficiency, you will drive continuous improvements and enhance the efficiency of our vehicle configuration capabilities.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across the organization to gather detailed requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and translate them into effective technical configurations
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and implementation plans
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations to ensure they meet all requirements and function as expected
- Analyze existing system data to identify optimization opportunities, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement
- Recommend and implement configuration changes to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work in tandem with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continued support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business requirements and devise effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Solid understanding of data analysis techniques, including querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL for database querying and reporting
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a software development environment

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated track record of successfully configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems to support evolving business needs
- Experience in implementing Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions to drive efficiency and innovation

Preferred Experience:
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration processes and systems
- Knowledge of Agile project management and software development practices

Tools & Technologies:
- [mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Power BI, Tableau)
- Collaboration and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions
- Agile development methodologies, including sprints, retrospectives, and continuous improvement
- Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a dynamic, fast-paced environment

Role Overview:
This technical configuration specialist role is responsible for bridging the gap between our organization's evolving business needs and the capabilities of our core enterprise systems. By combining your strong business acumen with technical proficiency, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects and supports our complex vehicle configuration processes. Your expertise in translating requirements into effective technical solutions will be instrumental in driving continuous improvements and enhancing the efficiency of our operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques
- Translate the gathered business requirements into comprehensive technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and implementation plans
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations to verify they meet all requirements and function as expected, collaborating with developers and IT support as needed
- Analyze existing system data to identify optimization opportunities, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, and recommend configuration changes to streamline processes
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Proactively identify opportunities to leverage Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to enhance the efficiency and accuracy of our vehicle configuration capabilities
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers and IT support, to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business requirements and devise effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Solid understanding of data analysis techniques, including querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL for database querying and reporting
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a software development environment

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems to support evolving business needs
- Experience in implementing and optimizing Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions to drive efficiency and innovation

Preferred Experience:
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration processes and systems
- Knowledge of Agile project management and software development practices

Tools & Technologies:
- [mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Power BI, Tableau)
- Collaboration and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)
- Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence platforms (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions
- Agile development methodologies, including sprints, retrospectives, and continuous improvement
- Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a dynamic, fast-paced environment
- Proactive approach to identifying and implementing innovative technical solutions to enhance business operations

Role Overview:
As a technical configuration specialist, you will play a pivotal role in aligning our core enterprise systems with the evolving needs of our vehicle configuration business. Leveraging your unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, you will be responsible for translating complex requirements into effective system configurations that drive operational efficiency and support our strategic objectives. By collaborating closely with stakeholders across the organization, you will ensure our [mention specific system] accurately reflects and supports our complex business processes, while continuously identifying opportunities for optimization and innovation.

Key Responsibilities:
- Partner with stakeholders from various departments to thoroughly understand their business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and prioritize them based on strategic importance
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and implementation plans
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations to verify they meet all requirements and function as expected, collaborating with developers and IT support as needed
- Analyze existing system data to identify optimization opportunities, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, and recommend configuration changes to streamline processes and enhance efficiency
- Proactively explore the application of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to automate and optimize our vehicle configuration capabilities
- Document system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Serve as a technical subject matter expert, providing guidance and support to cross-functional teams, including developers and IT support, to ensure smooth implementation and continued system performance

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business requirements and devise effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Solid understanding of data analysis techniques, including querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a software development environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL for database querying and reporting
- Understanding of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) principles and their practical applications

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated track record of successfully configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems to support evolving business needs
- Experience in implementing and optimizing innovative technical solutions, including the application of ML and AI, to drive efficiency and innovation

Preferred Experience:
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration processes and systems
- Knowledge of Agile project management and software development practices

Tools & Technologies:
- [mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Power BI, Tableau)
- Collaboration and documentation tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)
- Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence platforms (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions
- Agile development methodologies, including sprints, retrospectives, and continuous improvement
- Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a dynamic, fast-paced environment
- Proactive approach to identifying and implementing innovative technical solutions to enhance business operations and drive competitive advantage
